attributes.action: make all private landlords sign up to a code of conduct.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to make all private landlords accountable for the behaviour of their tennants to stop antisocial behaviour draining our local services,police social services and enviromental health offices,as as yet there is no law to help families who own there own homes next to where some landlords are repeatedly putting in bad tennants who shout scream abbuse and are violent if you complain about the noise they make some families suffer night after night with such noise and abuse they are left feeling so ill with nowhere to turn even with the help of the above services mentioned above as one landlord said "as long as i get the rent i dont care what my tennants do" please help us to stamp this behaviour out now .
